stories.title: The Little Pigs
stories.body: We all know the story of the three pigs. They pig huffed and puffed and only the pig with the strongly built house survived. THE END
stories.author: John

stories.title: Animal Farm
stories.body: This is the story about politics in the animal kingdom. A wonderful satirical piece. THE END.
stories.author: Chris

stories.title: The Green Mile
stories.body: The rivetting story of the innocent man who was wrongly sentenced to death. THE END.
stories.author: Stephen King

stories.title: Hitman 3
stories.body:
Prologue

The mysterious man walked into the store. He was dressed in a dark hoodie and a matching pair of boots. On a less busy day, he would have stood out like a sore thumb, but the supermarket was packed full today.
Gradually, he made his way towards his target...
stories.author: John Grisham

stories.title: The Hitman final
stories.body:
Prologue

The mysterious man walked into the store. He was dressed in a dark hoodie and a matching pair of boots. On a less busy day, he would have stood out like a sore thumb, but the supermarket was packed full today.
Gradually, he made his way towards his target...
stories.author: Godspower Elema
